channel.title: A simple site
channel.description: I give up on website making. I have no artistic talent at all. I have not got the ability to make anything nicely. I am destined to become a failure in life.

item.title: A simple site
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

runescape3dude:

I give up on website making. I have no artistic talent at all. I have not got the ability to make anything nicely. I am destined to become a failure in life.

Wrong attitude kid. With that attitude you’ll become a failure.

Read full topic

item.title: A simple site
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:18, topic:246696”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=325651.msg2555141#msg2555141 date=1227848161]

I think going as far as ‘life’ is a bit harsh there.

Why, all I ever spend any time on is the computer. I get nothing done, I have almost no friends at school. I suck at sports…

Other than that, life is decent enough.

Well all you need is practice, it looks good except for the images. If you team up with someone or look some stuff up on photoshop you can do good.
[/quote]

How does photoshop have anything to do with getting better at coding?[/quote]

Nothing, I never critized his coding ever, except when he linked to another page to get a menu to show up. The images he uses as backgrounds and stuff just don’t look good, you would understand if you saw the site.

Read full topic

item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:17, topic:246696”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=325651.msg2555069#msg2555069 date=1227844028]

I think going as far as ‘life’ is a bit harsh there.

Why, all I ever spend any time on is the computer. I get nothing done, I have almost no friends at school. I suck at sports…

Other than that, life is decent enough.
[/quote]

Well all you need is practice, it looks good except for the images. If you team up with someone or look some stuff up on photoshop you can do good.[/quote]

How does photoshop have anything to do with getting better at coding?

item.title: A simple site
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:11, topic:246696”]Gtf out of paint and use gimp or paint.net the images…they suck…the font…it sucks…it needs alot of work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2008, 04:54:51 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=325651.msg2552958#msg2552958 date=1227728847]
Seems webhosting in NZ fails really hard.
[/quote]

And this made me lol[/quote]
It does though. Which means, you can charge lots and give little.

I UPDATED THE COLORS.

item.title: A simple site
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Server-Unknown.Net:

I think this is by far the most confusing layout ever… Whats the point of this design ? I don’t get how you use it.

How is it confusing? It has the navbar up top, modules with stuff like login on the side, content inthe middle and plan modules down the bottom.

Read full topic
